DOC.brief_summary: To determine if Tetrix Cream remains on the hands after gentle washing with soap and water
DOC.brief_title: Study to Determine if Tetrix Cream is Removed From the Hands by Gentle Washing With Soap and Water
DOC.criteria: Normal subjects Male and Female Under the age of 18 years
DOC.keyword: Tetrix Cream remaining on hands after gentle washing with soap and water.
